articles.description: Arizona's Deandre Ayton became just the third player in Pac-12 history to be named both the conference's Player of the Year and Freshman of the Year.
articles.headline: Arizona's Deandre Ayton earns Pac-12's top player, freshman honors

articles.description: Last year, the Golden Flashes made a Cinderella run winning the MAC Tournament. In the opening round this year, Kent State finds the magic again on Kevin Zabo's game-winning shot.
articles.headline: Kent State wins at buzzer

images.caption: Last year, the Golden Flashes made a Cinderella run winning the MAC Tournament. In the opening round this year, Kent State finds the magic again on Kevin Zabo's game-winning shot.

articles.description: Cecil Williams had 18 points, six rebounds and six assists on Monday night and No. 8 seed Central Michigan dominated overtime for an 81-77 win over ninth-seeded Bowling Green in the first round of the Mid-American Conference Tournament.
articles.headline: Central Michigan powers past Bowling Green 81-77 in OT

articles.description: Kenny Carpenter scored 16 points, Anthony Wright added 12 and No. 8 seed Cleveland State upset No. 4 seed Oakland 44-43 in the Horizon League Tournament semifinals on Monday night.
articles.headline: Cleveland State upsets Oakland 44-43

articles.description: UNC Greensboro head coach Wes Miller is pleased with how his team is competing, but hopes the offensive improves in the 2nd half.
articles.headline: Miller loves the way his team is fighting

articles.description: Kevin Zabo had 19 points, including a layup as time expired, and Jalen Avery scored eight of his 13 points in the final seven-plus minutes to help Kent State slip past Northern Illinois 61-59 on Monday night in the first round of the Mid-American...
articles.headline: Zabo, Avery help Kent St. beat N. Illinois in MAC tourney
